title: 关于DC的血量条问题
author: middo
txt_content: DC也就是达特工艺，他把血量条弄到左上角去了……怎么把它调回来

replies.author: wish2012
replies.txt_content:
配置文件里有设置
# Moves the player's hearts to the top-left part of the screen with the magic meter.  (Note Health could still display if another mod does not adhere to Forge standards.)
    B:"Zelda Hud"=true
把原来的true改成false就行了

replies.author: 哥伦没有布
wish2012
replies.txt_content:
哥伦没有布 发表于 2014-1-24 12:07
配置文件在哪里
怎么改
config文件夹里dartcraft.cfg就是
